hibernate-mapping.query: from TeachCalendar as calendar where calendar.studentType.id=:studentTypeId and (extract(day from((calendar.start-current_date)))*(extract(day from(calendar.finish-current_date)))) <= all(select (extract(day from(c.start-current_date)))*(extract(day from(c.finish-current_date))) from TeachCalendar as c where c.studentType.id=:studentTypeId) )

select calendar.term from TeachCalendar as calendar where calendar.year=:year and calendar.studentType.id=:studentTypeId order by ((extract(day from(calendar.start-current_date)))*(extract(day from(calendar.finish-current_date))))

select calendar.year from TeachCalendar as calendar where calendar.studentType.id=:studentTypeId order by ((extract(day from(calendar.start-current_date)))*(extract(day from(calendar.finish-current_date))))
select calendar from TeachCalendar as calendar where calendar.studentType.id=:studentTypeId and current_date between calendar.start and calendar.finish
select calendar from TeachCalendar as calendar where calendar.studentType.id=:studentTypeId and current_date < calendar.start order by calendar.start asc
select calendar from TeachCalendar as calendar where calendar.studentType.id=:studentTypeId and current_date > calendar.finish order by calendar.start desc
from TeachCalendar as calendar where current_date between calendar.start and calendar.finish
